history.proof: intros d H. unfold DTA_ref_ok, dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy. hfcrush brefl: on use: kill_non_coacc_lazy_eq_kill_non_coacc, predta_kill_non_coacc_correct_ref_ok unfold: dta_kill_non_coacc, dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, DTA_ref_ok inv: DTA.
